settings.title: Introducing the world's first portable, automated CPAP cleaner
settings.content: A faster, easier, more effective way to clean CPAP machine equipment, the Wave Medical CPAP Cleaner is 99.9% EFFECTIVE at eradicating germs, mold and fungi from CPAP machines, tubing, masks, and humidifier chamber.  What's even better, the Wave CPAP Cleaner packs a punch; it is strong enough for home use, yet convenient enough for travel.

settings.blockquote: This truly is a lifesaver! I literally had the best night sleep in months! My mask actually felt clean. It took 5 seconds to set up, I cleaned my machine and tubing first, I connected my heated hose right to the machine with the adapter that came with it. Then, after it was done, I put my mask on the hose and put the other end into the machine and stuck the mask into the bag that came with the bundle. Done! This fit my airsense 10 machine perfectly. I purchased the Soclean a couple of months back and I was suffering every morning with an irritated throat not to mention the smell it left on my mask was unbearable! I paid $320 for the Soclean and for almost half the price, I found a machine that does it all without the smell and hassle of setting up. Even better, I travel frequently for work, I can actually take this with me!
settings.author: Danny Wright

settings.blockquote: I have been using the SoClean for 6 months and the ozone smell is just so nauseating. So I decided to give the wave sanitizer a try and I can honestly say this the best investment I’ve made! Not only does it clean my machine, mask and tubing, but it does it with absolutely no smell at all. I clean my mask daily and I dont even have to wait 2 hours anymore like with the SoClean. And the best part is its so small it fits great on my nightstand. No more infections! This thing really works!!!!!
settings.author: Janice Robertson

settings.blockquote: When I saw this CPAP cleaner for $150, no brainer. Now, having been using it for several months, it has been the best purchase I have ever made for my health. Thank you for a great product. It is such a great complement to my ResMed S9 system.
settings.author: Gabby Myers

settings.blockquote: I really love this CPAP cleaner! The instructions are easy to follow. It cleans my Philips System One really well and it's so easy to travel with. I have tried other CPAP cleaners and nothing worked as well as the Wave. I highly recommend it.
settings.author: Tamara Dubose

settings.title: Save $50 on SoClean 2
settings.content: Fully Automated

settings.title: Just place your CPAP mask inside the bag!
settings.text: The Wave CPAP Cleaner makes it easy to keep your CPAP machine, mask, and tubing free of germs and bacteria in as little as 30 minutes a day, and no matter where your busy life takes you. Weighing just 8 oz and about the size of a deck of cards, it comes with its own carry bag so you can breathe easy even when you're traveling. The carry bag is also used to house your mask during disinfection.

settings.title: Safer, healthier CPAP cleaning
settings.text: Even a drop of CPAP water left in your mask or hose can create a breeding ground for germs and bacteria. Wave's powerful activated oxygen (ozone) cleaning technology completely sanitizes your CPAP mask, hose, and reservoir without any water or harsh chemicals.

settings.title: See how easy it is to use the SoClean
settings.content: Watch Video

settings.html:
Keeping your CPAP equipment clean doesn't have to cost $300. Stop getting sick; buy the Wave CPAP Cleaner and save.


Buy Now View User Guide

settings.title: Reviews
settings.text:
This truly is a lifesaver! I literally had the best night sleep in months! My mask actually felt clean. It took 5 seconds to set up, I cleaned my machine and tubing first, I connected my heated hose right to the machine with the adapter that came with it. Then, after it was done, I put my mask on the hose and put the other end into the machine and stuck the mask into the bag that came with the bundle. Done! This fit my airsense 10 machine perfectly. I purchased the Soclean a couple of months back and I was suffering every morning with an irritated throat not to mention the smell it left on my mask was unbearable! I paid $320 for the Soclean and for almost half the price, I found a machine that does it all without the smell and hassle of setting up. Even better, I travel frequently for work, I can actually take this with me!

~  Danny J. Doe

settings.title: Reviews
settings.text:
I have been using the SoClean for 6 months and the ozone smell is just so nauseating. So I decided to give the wave sanitizer a try and I can honestly say this the best investment I’ve made! Not only does it clean my machine, mask and tubing, but it does it with absolutely no smell at all. I clean my mask daily and I dont even have to wait 2 hours anymore like with the SoClean. And the best part is its so small it fits great on my nightstand. No more infections! This thing really works!!!!!

~ Jocelyn Lopez

Wave Medical Products is an independent company not affiliated with Aeiomed, Apex Medical, Carefusion, Fisher & Paykel, Philips Respironics, PMI Probasic, Puritan Bennett, RESmart, ResMed, or Transcend.
